name: Hentai Endless: NetWalk
description:
Hentai Endless: NetWalk is a network construction logic game, and what you need to do is to connect all the devices to the network.Gameplay Guide
Victory Condition: You need to connect all the devices to the network.
How to Play: Left click to rotate clockwise (to the right), and right click to rotate anticlockwise (to the left).Function Keys
Keyboard P: One key connection
Keyboard S: Emergency avoidance (the background image turns white and you can continue to play)
Keyboard N: Next levelGame Features
Pleasing Pictures
Soothing Music
!! Endless Mode !!Endless Mode
You can set your favorite subreddit(s) as the source of the images and play the game all the time!!!


Some exciting subreddits:
ecchi - "Ecchi, NSFW pictures of anime characters."
hentai - "Hentai is a genre of pornography with Anime or Manga styling."
pantsu - "For fanservicey art from manga, anime, VNs, JRPGs, etc."
MoeMorphism - "Turning the inanimate into moe."
awwnime - "For all kinds of moe art. Especially cute anime girls and boys being cute. Strictly SFW, with named sources. Content from anime, manga, visual novels, JRPGs, Vocaloids, Touhou, etc, and original works. "

You can also combine multiple subreddits, for example:
awwnime+hentai - Combine awwnime subreddit and hentai subreddit!



You are welcome to add more interesting subreddits to the Community Hub!
